alert.note: Alert for Greenville; Laurens; Spartanburg; Union (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 4:53PM EDT until August 07 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Laurens County in Upstate South Carolina... Southeastern Greenville County in Upstate South Carolina... Southeastern Spartanburg County in Upstate South Carolina... Southern Union County in Upstate South Carolina... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 453 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Spartanburg to 16 miles north of Laurens to 14 miles south of Greenville Downtown, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Gray Court, Rose Hill State Park, Cross Keys, Fork Shoals, Cross Anchor, Sedalia, Enoree, Santuc, Ora and Clinton. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
